titles.title: Pike National Historic Trail Study Act of 2010
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to provide for the study of the Pike National Historic Trail.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Pike National Historic Trail Study Act of 2010 - Amends the National Trails System Act to require a study for the designation of Pike's Trail, a series of routes that follow the route taken by Lt. Zebulon Montgomery Pike during the 1806-1807 Pike expedition that began in Fort Bellefontaine, Missouri, and ended in Natchitoches, Louisiana, as a national historic trail.
